name: ARTillery
desc: Winner of the Best Arts and Crafts Hack of Techtogether's HobbyHacks Hackathon! A cure for Artist Block that not only gives users a simple prompt to follow, but also gives them various options to draw inspiration from. Used HTML, Bootstrap, and Javascript.

name: Move-it COVID
desc: An endless runner game for kids to learn best practices to prevent the spread of COVID-19 using HTML Canvas and Javascript.

name: Insanity Starter Pack
desc: With the push of a button, this web app will take you to a random page with a bunch of goofs and jokes.

name: Quick Meals
desc: Quick Meals serves personalized meals based on your set of criteria to make your time in the kitchen easier!
